  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/datasets/{datasetId}/metadata"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the metadata of the dataset identified by the given `datasetId`. Append `?attributes=labels` to include label information in response.
